You have decided that by becoming my wife and by the love I have for you, you will be able to get some stability and the immovable property mentioned in the third paragraph below shall be inherited by me as my father. The R.C.C. House, which is in my name, Assessment No. 476, taxes etc. are being paid to the Panchayat, Door No. 4-476, which is in my complete possession and rightful possession till date, and which no one else has any rightful possession of except me, with all the rights I have in the property and with all the love and affection I have for you, I consider it as a gift and without any consideration, the property worth Rs. 9,26,000/- in words, nine lakhs twenty six thousand rupees, is hereby transferred to you free of charge through this settlement deed. From now on, you shall pay the revenue taxes, etc. due on the property, get it registered in your name in the Panchayat records, build a house, etc., and enjoy it freely, with full rights to borrow, donate, sell, and bequeath it to yourself and your children and grandchildren. Neither I, nor my heirs, nor you nor your heirs, will ever be able to make any claims on the property. No mortgages, purchases, or leases, etc. have been made on the property to anyone before. MGuramma

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 5139 of 2024, dated 07/Mar/2024, executed by Meesala Ramana, in favour of his Wife, Meesala Guramma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 106 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 4-476, Assessment No. 476, comprised in survey number 145, situated in Revidi Madhura Rautulapalem Village & Gram Panchayat, Padmanabham Mandal, within the District of Visakhapatnam, registered at sub-registrar office Bheemunipatnam, is bounded as follows: North by: Vacant Site of Pinninti Appanna South by: Panchayathi C. C. Road East by: RCC Slab House of Sampangi Rama Rao West by: RCC Slab House of Meesala Venkata Rao

The aforementioned Meesala Guramma executed a Mortgage Deed on 19/Mar/2024 registered as document No. 5555 Of 2024, before the SRO Bheemunipatnam in favour of M/S Five Star Business Finance Limited towards the property measuring 106 Sq. Yds. (or) 472 Sq. Ft., situated in Revidi Madhura Rautulapalem, which was subsequently discharged vide Receipt Deed dated 06/Jan/2025 registered as document no. 87 Of 2025.[Ref:EC]

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
